techno.description: From a modest investment of Rs. 2 lakhs, Bandhan Bank has grew up to become this massive organisation worth Rs. 10,000 crores. Watch how it all began, here.
Although Mangalyaan's initial mission life was 6 months, it has now been working for more than 3.5 years. That's a lot of overtime! Watch the story of it's incredible journey.
Diu has become India's first island to go 100% day time solar powered. Here's its story.

WhatsApp founder Jan Koum has quit Facebook after disagreements over data privacy! See how he went from social welfare to the head of a 19 billion dollar company - here is the incredible story of WhatsApp.
Jaipur foot has been empowering the disabled for decades. Learn more about this Indian invention and organisation!
Have you ever thought about what would happen if a giant asteroid was to hit earth? What can we do to stop it?
In May 2018, a mysterious outbreak killed several people in Kerala. Here's some information about the deadly NIPAH virus.
